LanguageData.OE_Mooncloth.label: mooncloth
LanguageData.OE_Mooncloth.description: Fabric spun from microfibers extracted from Moonplants. It is tough, light, strong, luxurious and insulates well.
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Ogren.label: rough obsidia skin
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Ogren.description: Tanned, dried, scraped obsidia fauna skin. It is tough, strong, but insulates bad.
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Bruul.label: obsidia synthleather
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Bruul.description: Lightweight, thin obsidia fauna leather. It is very fragile and weak, but at the same time it perfectly protects against temperature and is incredibly beautiful.
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Direwolf.label: insulated obsidia fur
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Direwolf.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from obsidia fauna. It is beautiful, very durable and insulates well against cold.
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Astrinx.label: luxurious obsidia fur
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Astrinx.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from obsidia fauna. It is very beautiful, durable and insulates well against heat.
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Raptor.label: thermal obsidia scale
LanguageData.OE_Leather_Raptor.description: Tanned obsidia fauna leather. Very beautiful, strong and protects well from the heat.
LanguageData.OE_ObsidianSynthweave.label: obsidian synthweave
LanguageData.OE_ObsidianSynthweave.description: Fabric synthesized from Obsidian. Synthweave is similar in properties to the original.
LanguageData.OE_MythrilSynthweave.label: mythril synthweave
LanguageData.OE_MythrilSynthweave.description: Fabric synthesized from Mythril. Synthweave is similar in properties to the original.
LanguageData.OE_PlatinumSynthweave.label: platinum synthweave
LanguageData.OE_PlatinumSynthweave.description: Fabric synthesized from Platinum. Synthweave is similar in properties to the original.
LanguageData.OE_EmpyriumSynthweave.label: empyrium synthweave
LanguageData.OE_EmpyriumSynthweave.description: Fabric synthesized from Empyrium. Synthweave is similar in properties to the original.
LanguageData.OE_OrichalcumSynthweave.label: orichalcum synthweave
LanguageData.OE_OrichalcumSynthweave.description: Fabric synthesized from Orichalcum. Synthweave is similar in properties to the original.
